title: Virgin Wanted
description: New York Times and USA Today Bestselling Author, Opal Carewwriting as Amber CarewGillian is tired of her mother trying to push her on a date with her boss' son. She doesn't want to be hooked up with any guy—especially a rich one—let alone one who would put an ad in the paper looking for a virgin, no less.Cade is tired of his father trying to hook him up with a bride. If he did want to find a wife, which is not top on his priority list, he is perfectly capable of finding his own woman. In fact, he's quite intrigued by the sparky-eyed beauty storming out of his office building. She's spunky, determined — and sexy as hell. When she mistakes him for a blue collar worker, he decides this is the perfect opportunity to get to know a woman he's attracted to without worrying about whether she's after his money.Gill is determined to put Mr. Tall-Dark-and-Handsome out of her mind, even though his touch ignites her passion like a keg of jet fuel. Mom calls that kind of passion infatuation. Cade calls it chemistry. Gill just calls it dangerous. 60,000 wordsPlus excerpts for Virgin Wizard by Amber Carew and Secret Weapon by Opal Carew.
author: Amber Carew
